Why yall like this

This author is great. Good art, hot and dirty sex, and lots of focus on the psychological aspects involved. And not in the usual instantly mind broken way, but actual psychology, like the cuck's awareness of being a freak and grappling with self-hatred and arousal, and the girl's interest in the lifestyle while also genuinely loving her boyfriend. Usually, in hentai especially, things are very black and white and pushed to the extreme. This is different, it feels largely like something that could actually happen in a cuckold relationship. I appreciate seeing that angle.

So that's it, huh? That's the ending. Honestly, after reading Rental Lovers I just knew that Eightman would go for a shitty "happy" ending with this one, where the girl stays with the guy despite his fetish, contradicting all of the internal conflict that we're supposed to believe she went through. Why is it that every decent cuck in NTR gets a bad ending while this pathetic genetic failure gets a happy one? That's what bothers me. And the author can't even commit to actually give us a conclusion. I was actually enjoying this shit until the open ending. All of those hints at her possibly falling in love with Makita were just for cheap fake tension. I genuinely don't have an issue with happy NTR endings per se. I know it scratches an itch that many have, and it's certainly original. I just don't think this cuck deserves that, and I hate being misled by fake tension.
